A ruler who has not been officially crowned by a member of the Church will never be fully accepted by his vassals as legitimate.\nThe more years he wastes before being anointed, the more likely his vassals will be to doubt the validity of his right to rule.

A ruler who has not been officially crowned by a member of the Church will never be fully accepted by his vassals as legitimate.\nThe more years he wastes before being anointed, the more likely his vassals will be to doubt the validity of his right to rule.

A ruler who has not been officially crowned by a member of the Church will never be fully accepted by his vassals as legitimate.\nThe more years he wastes before being anointed, the more likely his vassals will be to doubt the validity of his right to rule.
Only the Grand Theoginist is fit to crown me!
Write a letter to the Pope, requesting him to crown you §Y[Root.GetTitle]§! of §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!.
Send for the most powerful Bishop in the realm!
Write a letter to the most influential and powerful [Root.Religion.GetName] Bishop in your realm, asking him to crown you §Y[Root.GetTitle]§! of §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!.

Write a letter to a minor Bishop, asking him to crown you §Y[Root.GetTitle]§! of §Y[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!. \nThough a less prestigious choice than others, doing so will at least placate your vassals and will be less likely to bankrupt your realm.
I AM THE POPE! I WANT ALL OF THE STUFF!

To the Excellent [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s coronation, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] donates a small sum of money to the Holy Mother Church as a show of [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Slaughtering my enemies on the battlefield and putting my life on the line has made me really feel alive!
BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD
SKULLS FOR THE SKULL THRONE

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Littering the ground with the deceased and putting my life on the line has made me really feel alive!
We could have been brothers, you could have all joined us!
Yes, more carcasses for papa Nurgle!

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Leaving the battlefield covered in the blood of my enemies and putting my life on the line has made me really feel alive!!
Yes! More, more! Scar me harder!!!

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Destroying the enemies that would see me dead and putting my life on the line has made me really feel alive!
All according to plan!
Ahh you were supposed to be pawns!

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Littering the ground with the deceased in the glory of the gods made me really feel alive!
For the gods!

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Littering the ground with the deceased in the glory of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] made me really feel alive!
Don't stand in the way of Chaos

Ever since tha great krumpin' of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've feelin' [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like neva before. Snikin' gitz for tha glory of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] made me really feel like a new git again!
We bashed 'er 'eadz in

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Littering the ground with the deceased in the glory of the gods made me really feel alive!
A willing sacrifice
A waste of slaves

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Littering the ground with the deceased in the glory of the gods made me really feel alive!
They joined their ancestors
That's a new grudge
Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. destroying those that oppose the plan made me really feel alive!
The plan must proceed

Ever since the battle of [battlefield_location.GetName], I've felt a devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] like never before. Littering the ground with the deceased in the glory of the gods made me really feel alive!
Good.
